basics.name: David William Erwin
basics.label: Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Student
basics.summary: Passionate Computer Science student with expertise in embedded programming and machine learning, with a particular interest in applying deep learning to financial forecasting. Skilled in collaborating with professional teams, leading small groups, and developing efficient machine learning pipelines and real-time hardware solutions. Excited to contribute technical expertise to impactful AI and ML projects.

work.name: Pablo Dylan
work.summary: Developed and deployed a custom neural network model tailored to meet project-specific objectives.
